fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Healing Lily (Night): Heal your target and all their visitors. You are able to protect yourself.
-Dead Lily (Night): Cause your target and all their visitors to receive incorrect feedback. 2 uses, usable once while dead if you still have charges.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Healing Lily can protect anyone - including yourself and Plaguebearers.
